help: Suffix routing rules for file organization.
This file defines where files with different suffixes are stored in the archive structure.
├── SOURCES/      - Raw scans and master files
└── (date folder)  - Preview files stored directly here
- 'SOURCES': Files go to SOURCES/ subfolder (raw scans, unprocessed masters)
- 'DERIVATIVES': Files go to DERIVATIVES/ subfolder (processed outputs)
- '.': Files go directly to date folder root (small preview images)
- '*': Default folder for unknown suffixes (if not specified, defaults to 'DERIVATIVES')
Suffix matching is case-insensitive (RAW = raw = Raw).
